name: Draw a Card Deck
description:
Tap the screen to flip a card.
Ideal if you need a deck of cards for games such as drinking games, or to solve an argument.
Draw a Card offers you different card layouts and options.
With Draw a Card you can define the cards containing in the deck, and you can set the deck to shuffle after a card being flipped, or to draw cards until the deck is empty.
You can also download new decks completely free. There are many categories to chose from.
